## MoneypStore.state property

The current store state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get state(): MoneypStoreState<T>;
```

## Remarks

Should not be accessed before the store is loaded. Assign a function to [onLoaded](./lib-base.moneypstore.onloaded.md) to get a callback when this happens.

See [MoneypStoreState](./lib-base.moneypstorestate.md) for the list of properties returned.
